actions: Spent 4-6 hours a day, 6 days a week learning HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, and web design in a project-based curriculum

Designed and created a basic CMS to run my website using PHP, HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript; created a design system to manage page layouts, reusable components and modules; created a programmatic theme switcher with dark mode
Built a web application to show local vegan restaurants using Supabase, Nuxt/Vue, SCSS and LeafletJS
Led redesign of signup and onboarding flows, resulting in increased lead capture and conversion rates
Built out a clinical operations dashboard MVP with automated workflows, resulting in reduced overhead on administrative tasks and faster patient care
Introduced better product team practices, resulting in improved product quality via significantly fewer bugs across my product surfaces
Helped start a product management team to turn our ad-hoc consulting offering into an off-the-shelf software library for data scientists, supporting team goal to increase sales 20% year over year
Led the build of internal tooling to reduce project delivery times by up to 50%, roughly doubling profit margins across projects
Trained consultants on methodology, model interpretation, client communication, and other project delivery skills
Led the delivery of machine learning projects for large pharmaceutical clients, predicting rare disease diagnoses and disease progressions in large healthcare datasets
Turned around a struggling relationship with a Fortune 500 client, resulting in their decision to sign a 4-year contract extension and extend our work to their entire immunology portfolio
Led hiring and interviews for the consulting team, helping grow the team from 4 to 15 people in two years while maintaining a happy, healthy, inclusive culture
Became an Excel wiz & spreadsheet lover; learned soft skills & managing stakeholder relationships; developed a love for working at the intersection of technical and non-technical teams
